In this course, participants will delve into the core principles of mathematics, covering topics such as numbers and operations, algebraic expressions, geometry, measurement, functions and graphs, statistics, probability, and problem-solving strategies. Through a combination of theoretical explanations, practical examples, and hands-on exercises, students will gain a deep understanding of each concept and its real-world applications.

The course begins with an exploration of the number system, including natural numbers, integers, fractions, decimals, and their properties. Participants will learn how to perform basic arithmetic operations and solve problems involving numerical expressions. Moving on to algebraic expressions, students will discover the power of variables and equations, learning techniques to simplify expressions and solve linear equations and inequalities.

Geometry will be a key focus, where learners will delve into the properties of geometric shapes, measurement, and spatial relationships. They will explore concepts such as perimeter, area, volume, and angles, as well as geometric transformations and the Pythagorean theorem. Through interactive activities and visualizations, students will develop a strong intuition for geometric concepts.

The course will also cover functions and graphs, providing a solid introduction to fundamental functions such as linear and quadratic functions. Participants will learn how to graph functions, analyze their behavior, and solve equations graphically. Additionally, they will explore statistical concepts, including data representation, measures of central tendency, and probability theory, gaining practical skills for interpreting and analyzing data.

Throughout the course, an emphasis will be placed on problem-solving strategies, empowering students to approach mathematical problems with confidence and creativity. They will learn how to dissect complex problems, identify relevant information, and apply appropriate mathematical techniques to find solutions. Real-world applications and examples will be integrated to demonstrate the relevance of mathematical concepts in everyday life and various fields, including science, engineering, finance, and technology.

By the end of the course, participants will have mastered the fundamental concepts of mathematics and developed critical thinking skills essential for success in higher-level mathematics courses and professional endeavors. Whether they are preparing for standardized tests, pursuing further studies in STEM disciplines, or simply seeking to enhance their mathematical literacy, this course will provide a solid foundation for their mathematical journey.

" } ] }, { "id": 1997, "teacher_id": 934, "creator_id": 934, "category_id": 602, "type": "webinar", "private": 0, "slug": "Fundamentals-Of-Physics", "start_date": 1713715200, "duration": 180, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/fizik.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/fizik (2).jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1t41Q3xRM8", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 15, "price": null, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 1, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 0, "forum": 0, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": null, "points": null, "message_for_reviewer": "thank you .", "status": "active", "created_at": 1624954285, "updated_at": 1713346759, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 3, "webinar_id": 1997, "locale": "en", "title": "Fundamentals Of Physics", "seo_description": "Fundamentals Of Physics", "description": "

Physics, often called the fundamental science, seeks to understand the fundamental principles governing the behavior of matter, energy, space, and time. The course \"Fundamentals of Physics\" serves as an introduction to the foundational concepts and principles that underpin this vast field of study. Through a blend of theoretical exploration, practical experimentation, and real-world applications, students will embark on a journey to unravel the mysteries of the physical world around them.

This course begins by laying the groundwork with an exploration of measurement and units, teaching students the language and tools necessary for precise quantitative analysis. From there, students delve into the core principles of motion, force, and energy, as described by Newton's laws of motion and the principles of conservation. Through engaging demonstrations and problem-solving exercises, students will gain a deep understanding of how objects move, interact, and transform energy within various physical systems.

As the course progresses, students will explore the fascinating realms of fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, electricity, and magnetism. They will uncover the underlying principles governing the behavior of fluids, the transfer of heat, and the interaction of electric and magnetic fields. Through hands-on laboratory experiments and theoretical exploration, students will gain insight into the mechanisms that drive these phenomena and their practical applications in everyday life and cutting-edge technologies.

Moreover, this course will introduce students to the profound implications of modern physics, including the theory of relativity, quantum mechanics, and nuclear physics. By examining these revolutionary theories, students will develop a deeper appreciation for the interconnectedness of the physical universe and the remarkable power of human intellect to comprehend its mysteries.

Throughout the course, emphasis will be placed on critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and scientific inquiry. Students will learn to analyze complex phenomena, formulate hypotheses, and test their understanding through experimentation and observation. By the end of the course, students will have acquired a solid foundation in the principles of physics, preparing them for further study in STEM disciplines and equipping them with the tools to engage with and contribute to the ever-evolving field of physics.

Whether pursuing a career in science, engineering, or simply seeking to understand the natural world more deeply, \"Fundamentals of Physics\" provides a solid grounding upon which students can build their knowledge and curiosity, inspiring a lifelong journey of discovery and exploration.

Are you eager to dive into modern web development and create dynamic, interactive web applications? Look no further than our comprehensive \"Learn Angular From Scratch\" course! Angular is one of the most popular frameworks for building single-page applications, and this course is your ultimate guide to mastering it from the ground up.

Whether you're a seasoned developer looking to expand your skill set or a complete beginner in web development, this course is designed to cater to all skill levels. You'll start by setting up your development environment and creating your first Angular project using Angular CLI. From there, you'll embark on a journey through the core concepts and features of Angular, gradually building up your expertise.

Through a combination of in-depth theoretical explanations, hands-on coding exercises, and real-world examples, you'll gain a solid understanding of Angular's building blocks, including components, templates, data binding, services, and directives. You'll learn how to manage data effectively, handle user input with forms, and navigate between different parts of your application using Angular Router.

As you progress through the course, you'll explore advanced Angular topics such as dependency injection, observables and RxJS, and best practices for performance optimization and code organization. You'll also discover how to test your Angular applications thoroughly and deploy them to production environments with confidence.

But learning Angular isn't just about mastering the framework itself—it's also about adopting a mindset of continuous improvement and staying up-to-date with the latest tools and techniques. That's why this course goes beyond the basics to cover advanced topics like state management, Angular CLI tips and tricks, and industry best practices.

By the end of the course, you'll have not only the knowledge but also the practical skills to build professional-quality Angular applications from scratch. Whether you're aspiring to become a front-end developer, enhance your career prospects, or simply embark on a new learning journey, \"Learn Angular From Scratch\" is your gateway to success in the world of web development.

Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a proficient Angular developer!

A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a specialized role within the software development landscape, blending the skills of a software engineer with those of a quality assurance professional. SDETs play a critical role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and scalability of software applications by designing, developing, and maintaining automated test suites and frameworks.

SDETs are responsible for not only identifying and executing test cases but also for actively participating in the software development lifecycle from the early stages of design and development. By leveraging their programming skills and deep understanding of testing methodologies, SDETs collaborate closely with software developers to embed quality assurance practices into the development process itself, rather than treating it as a separate phase.

Key responsibilities of an SDET include:

  1. Automated Testing: Developing and maintaining automated test scripts and frameworks to validate software functionality across different layers of the application stack, including front-end, back-end, and API layers. This involves writing code to simulate user interactions, verify data integrity, and ensure application stability.

  2. Test Planning and Strategy: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop comprehensive test plans, strategies, and acceptance criteria based on project requirements and user stories. SDETs contribute to defining test coverage, prioritizing test cases, and estimating testing efforts for different features and releases.

  3. Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid and reliable software delivery. SDETs work alongside DevOps engineers to automate the build, test, and deployment processes, facilitating faster feedback loops and shorter release cycles.

  4. Performance and Scalability Testing: Conducting performance testing activities to assess the responsiveness, throughput, and scalability of software applications under various load conditions. SDETs leverage performance testing tools and techniques to identify bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and ensure optimal user experience.

  5. Defect Management: Collaborating with development teams to identify, prioritize, and triage software defects throughout the development lifecycle. SDETs utilize defect tracking systems to log and track issues, conduct root cause analysis, and verify defect resolutions to maintain product quality.

  6. Agile and DevOps Practices: Embracing Agile methodologies and DevOps practices to foster collaboration, transparency, and continuous improvement across development and testing teams. SDETs actively participate in Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to align testing activities with development goals.

In essence, SDETs serve as the guardians of software quality, advocating for a culture of quality assurance and automation within organizations. By combining their technical expertise with a passion for delivering high-quality software, SDETs play a pivotal role in driving innovation, mitigating risks, and enhancing customer satisfaction in today's fast-paced software development environment.

" } ] }, { "id": 2022, "teacher_id": 934, "creator_id": 934, "category_id": 613, "type": "course", "private": 0, "slug": "Cyber-Security", "start_date": null, "duration": 90, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/cyber-security-.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/cyber-security.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shQEXpUwaIY", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 25, "price": 55, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 1, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 0, "forum": 1, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": 365, "points": 3, "message_for_reviewer": "Thank you for reviewing.", "status": "active", "created_at": 1678910860, "updated_at": 1713270803, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 170, "webinar_id": 2022, "locale": "en", "title": "Cyber Security", "seo_description": "Installment payment is a popular method of paying for goods and services that allows customers to spread out the cost of a purchase over a period of time.", "description": "

Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting computer systems, networks, programs, and data from digital attacks, unauthorized access, theft, or damage aimed at exploitation. With the increasing reliance on digital technologies across all sectors, cybersecurity has become a critical aspect of safeguarding sensitive information, privacy, and maintaining operational integrity.

The scope of cybersecurity encompasses various domains, including:

  1. Network Security: This involves securing the communication channels and data transmission within computer networks. It includes implementing firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and virtual private networks (VPNs) to prevent unauthorized access and ensure data confidentiality and integrity.

  2. Endpoint Security: Endpoint devices such as computers, smartphones, and tablets are often targeted by cybercriminals. Endpoint security focuses on protecting these devices from malware, ransomware, and other malicious threats through antivirus software, encryption, and regular patch management.

  3. Application Security: Applications and software systems may contain vulnerabilities that can be exploited by attackers to gain unauthorized access or disrupt services. Application security involves implementing secure coding practices, performing regular code reviews, and using tools like penetration testing to identify and mitigate potential weaknesses.

  4. Data Security: Data is a valuable asset for organizations, and protecting it from theft, manipulation, or destruction is crucial. Data security involves encrypting sensitive information, implementing access controls, and establishing data backup and recovery procedures to ensure data availability and integrity.

  5. Cloud Security: With the adoption of cloud computing services, organizations need to secure their data and applications hosted on third-party cloud platforms. Cloud security includes implementing strong authentication mechanisms, data encryption, and monitoring tools to detect and respond to suspicious activities in cloud environments.

  6. Identity and Access Management (IAM): IAM involves managing user identities and controlling their access to resources within an organization's IT infrastructure. This includes implementing multi-factor authentication, role-based access controls, and privileged access management to prevent unauthorized users from gaining entry to sensitive systems and data.

  7. Incident Response and Disaster Recovery: Despite preventive measures, cyberattacks may still occur. Incident response plans outline procedures for detecting, analyzing, and mitigating security incidents, while disaster recovery plans ensure the restoration of IT services and data in the event of a cyber breach or natural disaster.

  8. Security Awareness Training: Human error is often a significant contributing factor to cybersecurity incidents. Security awareness training educates employees about potential threats, phishing attacks, and best practices for maintaining security hygiene, reducing the risk of inadvertent security breaches.

In today's interconnected digital landscape, cybersecurity is not only a technical challenge but also a business imperative. Organizations must continually adapt their cybersecurity strategies to address evolving threats and comply with regulatory requirements to safeguard their assets, reputation, and customer trust. Collaboration between cybersecurity professionals, IT teams, management, and stakeholders is essential to effectively manage cyber risks and ensure a resilient security posture.

Led by seasoned financial experts, \"The Complete Foundation Stock Trading\" course takes you on a journey through the key principles, strategies, and practices that underpin successful trading. From understanding the basics of the stock market to mastering advanced trading techniques, each module is carefully crafted to equip you with actionable insights and practical tools to thrive in today's dynamic trading environment.

What You'll Learn:

  • Introduction to Stock Trading: Gain a solid understanding of the fundamentals of the stock market, including its history, purpose, and different types of stocks.

  • Fundamental Analysis: Learn how to evaluate companies using fundamental analysis techniques, including analyzing financial statements and assessing industry trends.

  • Technical Analysis: Master the art of technical analysis, from reading stock charts to identifying key chart patterns and indicators.

  • Risk Management: Discover the importance of risk management in trading and learn effective strategies to protect your capital and minimize losses.

  • Trading Psychology: Explore the psychological aspects of trading and develop the discipline and mindset needed to navigate market fluctuations with confidence.

  • Trading Strategies: Explore various trading strategies, including long-term investing, value investing, growth investing, and momentum trading.

  • Brokerage and Trading Platforms: Understand the different brokerage firms and trading platforms available, and learn how to select the right one for your trading needs.

  • Regulatory Environment and Ethics: Navigate the regulatory landscape of the financial markets and understand the ethical considerations involved in trading.

  • Building a Trading Plan: Learn how to create a personalized trading plan tailored to your financial goals, risk tolerance, and trading style.

  • Case Studies and Practical Applications: Apply course concepts to real-world trading scenarios through case studies and hands-on exercises.

Who Should Take This Course:

  • Aspiring traders who want to learn the fundamentals of stock trading from scratch.
  • Intermediate traders looking to solidify their understanding of stock market principles and improve their trading skills.
  • Anyone interested in building a strong foundation in stock trading to confidently navigate the financial markets.

Why Choose Us:

  • Comprehensive Curriculum: Our course covers everything you need to know to get started in stock trading, from basic concepts to advanced strategies.
  • Expert Instruction: Learn from seasoned professionals with years of experience in the financial industry who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and expertise.
  • Practical Learning: Our hands-on approach ensures that you not only understand the theory behind stock trading but also gain practical skills that you can apply immediately in the real world.
  • Supportive Community: Join a vibrant community of like-minded traders where you can exchange ideas, ask questions, and collaborate on trading strategies.
  • Flexible Learning: Access our course materials anytime, anywhere, and learn at your own pace with our flexible online platform.

\"Introducción al Español: Fundamentos y Aplicaciones Básicas\"

Este curso está diseñado para personas que desean aprender español desde cero o que tienen conocimientos muy básicos del idioma. A lo largo del curso, los estudiantes explorarán los fundamentos del español y desarrollarán habilidades básicas de comunicación en situaciones cotidianas.

Contenido del Curso:

  1. Fundamentos del Idioma:

    • El alfabeto español y su pronunciación
    • Los números y las expresiones básicas
    • Los saludos y las presentaciones

  2. Gramática Básica:

    • Los sustantivos y los artículos definidos e indefinidos
    • Los pronombres personales y posesivos
    • Los verbos regulares en presente

  3. Conversación y Vocabulario:

    • Expresiones útiles para situaciones cotidianas (en el supermercado, en el restaurante, etc.)
    • Vocabulario básico relacionado con la familia, la casa, los hobbies, etc.
    • Prácticas de diálogo para desarrollar la fluidez oral

  4. Cultura y Tradiciones:

    • Introducción a la cultura hispanohablante
    • Celebraciones y festividades populares en países de habla española
    • Recursos para aprender más sobre la cultura hispana

Objetivo del Curso: Los participantes aprenderán los fundamentos del español y adquirirán habilidades básicas de comunicación que les permitirán interactuar en situaciones cotidianas tanto en contextos personales como profesionales.

Este curso es ideal para principiantes absolutos y no se requiere experiencia previa en el idioma. ¡Ven y sumérgete en el mundo del español con nosotros!

{ "id": 206, "webinar_id": 2065, "locale": "en", "title": "Learn French in 10 steps", "seo_description": null, "description": "

You can learn French in 10 steps! It's possible!


Lets take a look of how we can do that!




As beginners we do think learning a new language is almost impossible in short time. But have you tried these 10 steps that also helped me gain discipline and learn any other languages? If no theres a chance of you to do that, lets take a look at whats inside.


What i teach in this course is those 10 steps and how youre going to keep up and establish discipline.

The important thing here is not the 10 magical steps but the discipline that you will build. And no i guarantee it will be so fun , you will forget the word 'boring' . You will love to continue and by the time you will realise youre already disciplined. After that everything is simple. 10 Steps are the cherry on the top!

Building a portfolio showcasing completed projects empowers you for job interviews, giving you solutions, code, apps, and projects to display to recruiters.", "description": "
  • Simple Calculator: Create a basic calculator application that performs arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
  • Address Book: Build an address book application that allows users to add, view, update, and delete contact information.
  • Tic-Tac-Toe Game: Develop a simple console-based tic-tac-toe game where two players can take turns marking their moves on a grid.
  • Hangman Game: Implement a text-based hangman game where players guess letters to reveal a hidden word.
  • Temperature Converter: Design a program that converts temperatures between Fahrenheit, Celsius, and Kelvin scales.

These projects are beginner-friendly and provide a solid foundation in Java programming concepts.

The most updated and comprehensive Project Management course on Udemy! You'll learn the skills that encompass the entire Project Management role and process: from project initiation to planning, from stakeholder analysis to risk management, from scheduling to budgeting, and from execution to monitoring and controlling. We also include real-world case studies, interactive exercises, and downloadable resources to enhance your learning experience.

Currently, there are over 3,000+ job listings worldwide seeking Project Managers, offering competitive salaries averaging $100,000 / year.

The demand for Project Management is rapidly increasing as organizations recognize the critical role it plays in achieving successful outcomes.

But how do you break into the field? There are no specific degrees or certifications for Project Management, and many Project Managers enter the field through chance or connections. That changes here - we'll equip you with all the essential skills needed for Project Management and give you the best chance of securing your desired job. No more guesswork - we'll provide you with clear guidance on what you need to learn and what steps to take, all from an experienced Project Management professional.

Students are not required to have prior knowledge - we'll cover the basics, teach you how to apply them effectively, help you advance your project management skills, and ultimately, maximize your opportunities for landing a job as a Project Manager.


" } ] }, { "id": 1998, "teacher_id": 1015, "creator_id": 1015, "category_id": 605, "type": "webinar", "private": 0, "slug": "Beauty-Makeup", "start_date": 1727814600, "duration": 100, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/makeup.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/high-angle-view-woman-hand-table.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O_qgaOUR3Fo", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 50, "price": 100, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 0, "partner_instructor": 1, "subscribe": 1, "forum": 0, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": 730, "points": null, "message_for_reviewer": "thank you.", "status": "active", "created_at": 1624965321, "updated_at": 1713342716, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 4, "webinar_id": 1998, "locale": "en", "title": "Beauty and Makeup Mastery", "seo_description": "Beauty & Makeup Strategy", "description": "

Unlock the secrets of beauty and master the art of makeup with our comprehensive Beauty & Makeup Mastery course. Whether you're an aspiring makeup artist, a beauty enthusiast, or simply looking to enhance your personal makeup skills, this course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and techniques needed to achieve flawless looks every time.

Delving into the realms of skincare, color theory, makeup application, and beyond, this course covers everything you need to know to create stunning makeup looks tailored to your unique style and features. From perfecting the basics to mastering advanced techniques, our expert instructors will guide you through each step, ensuring you develop a solid foundation in beauty and makeup artistry.

Throughout the course, you'll learn how to:

  • Understand the importance of skincare as the foundation of any makeup routine.
  • Choose the right products and tools for your skin type and desired makeup look.
  • Apply foundation seamlessly, conceal imperfections, and enhance facial features with contouring and highlighting.
  • Create captivating eye makeup looks, from subtle everyday glam to dramatic evening styles.
  • Define and shape eyebrows for a polished and balanced appearance.
  • Achieve picture-perfect lips with precision lip makeup techniques.
  • Explore the world of special effects and creative makeup for theatrical and fantasy looks.
  • Stay updated on the latest makeup trends and adapt your skills to suit any occasion or environment.

With hands-on demonstrations, practical exercises, and personalized feedback from our experienced instructors, you'll gain the confidence and expertise to unleash your creativity and express your unique beauty through makeup.

Whether you're pursuing a career in the beauty industry or simply passionate about makeup artistry, our Beauty & Makeup Mastery course will empower you to unlock your full potential and transform yourself into a true makeup maestro.

Enroll now and embark on a journey of beauty exploration and self-expression!

" } ] }, { "id": 1999, "teacher_id": 929, "creator_id": 929, "category_id": 621, "type": "course", "private": 0, "slug": "Health-Nutrition-Life-Coach", "start_date": null, "duration": 90, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/healty.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/health.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Health+and+Nutrition+Life+Coach", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 55, "price": 65, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 1, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 1, "forum": 1, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": 730, "points": 500, "message_for_reviewer": "I solved the problems you mentioned", "status": "active", "created_at": 1625037906, "updated_at": 1713293586, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 5, "webinar_id": 1999, "locale": "en", "title": "Health and Nutrition Life Coach", "seo_description": "Health and Nutrition Life Coach", "description": "

Are you passionate about helping others achieve their health and wellness goals? Become a Health and Nutrition Life Coach and make a meaningful impact on people's lives by guiding them towards a healthier lifestyle through personalized nutrition, behavior change strategies, and holistic wellness practices.

As a Health and Nutrition Life Coach, you will empower individuals to take control of their well-being by providing them with the knowledge, support, and accountability they need to make sustainable lifestyle changes. Through a client-centered approach, you will work collaboratively with your clients to set achievable goals, address challenges, and celebrate successes along their wellness journey.

Your role as a Health and Nutrition Life Coach extends beyond simply providing nutritional advice. You will delve into the psychological and emotional aspects of eating habits, helping clients develop a positive relationship with food and overcome barriers to healthier living. By focusing on the interconnectedness of mind, body, and spirit, you will guide clients towards achieving optimal health and vitality.

Whether you're interested in working one-on-one with clients, leading group coaching sessions, or specializing in specific areas such as weight management, sports nutrition, or chronic disease prevention, the field of health and nutrition coaching offers endless opportunities for growth and fulfillment.

Join this dynamic and rewarding profession and become a catalyst for positive change in the lives of others. With your passion for health and wellness and your dedication to helping others thrive, you can make a difference as a Health and Nutrition Life Coach.

" } ] }, { "id": 2000, "teacher_id": 923, "creator_id": 867, "category_id": 609, "type": "webinar", "private": 0, "slug": "The-Art-of-Effective-Time-Management", "start_date": 1725201000, "duration": 90, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/timee.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/time.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXBA4eWskrc", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 10, "price": 30, "organization_price": null, "support": 0, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 0, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 0, "forum": 0, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": null, "points": null, "message_for_reviewer": null, "status": "active", "created_at": 1625044975, "updated_at": 1713342173, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 6, "webinar_id": 2000, "locale": "en", "title": "The Art of Effective Time Management", "seo_description": "How Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners can Get 10X More Done in Half of the Time", "description": "

In a world where time is one of our most valuable resources, mastering the art of effective time management is essential for success in both personal and professional endeavors. \"The Art of Effective Time Management\" is a comprehensive course designed to equip individuals with the tools and techniques necessary to maximize productivity, minimize stress, and achieve their goals with greater efficiency.

Through a combination of theoretical insights, practical strategies, and interactive exercises, participants will embark on a journey to unlock their full potential and reclaim control over their time. This course goes beyond simple tips and tricks, delving deep into the psychology and principles underlying effective time management practices.

Participants will learn how to identify common time-wasting activities, overcome procrastination, and eliminate distractions that derail their focus. They will explore various prioritization techniques, such as the Eisenhower Matrix and the Pareto Principle, to ensure that they are investing their time and energy in activities that align with their goals and values.

\"The Art of Effective Time Management\" empowers individuals to develop personalized time management plans tailored to their unique needs and preferences. From setting SMART goals to creating daily schedules and implementing time-blocking strategies, participants will gain practical skills that they can apply immediately to enhance their productivity and effectiveness.

Moreover, this course equips participants with the resilience and adaptability needed to navigate the challenges of modern life, including interruptions, multitasking, and unexpected demands on their time. By cultivating a mindset of mindfulness and intentionality, participants will learn how to maintain balance and prioritize self-care amidst their busy schedules.

Whether you're a busy professional striving for greater work-life balance, a student juggling academic deadlines and extracurricular activities, or an entrepreneur seeking to optimize your business operations, \"The Art of Effective Time Management\" offers invaluable insights and guidance to help you thrive in today's fast-paced world.

Join us on this transformative journey and unlock the secrets to mastering time, achieving your goals, and living a more fulfilling life.

Are you eager to dive into modern web development and create dynamic, interactive web applications? Look no further than our comprehensive \"Learn Angular From Scratch\" course! Angular is one of the most popular frameworks for building single-page applications, and this course is your ultimate guide to mastering it from the ground up.

Whether you're a seasoned developer looking to expand your skill set or a complete beginner in web development, this course is designed to cater to all skill levels. You'll start by setting up your development environment and creating your first Angular project using Angular CLI. From there, you'll embark on a journey through the core concepts and features of Angular, gradually building up your expertise.

Through a combination of in-depth theoretical explanations, hands-on coding exercises, and real-world examples, you'll gain a solid understanding of Angular's building blocks, including components, templates, data binding, services, and directives. You'll learn how to manage data effectively, handle user input with forms, and navigate between different parts of your application using Angular Router.

As you progress through the course, you'll explore advanced Angular topics such as dependency injection, observables and RxJS, and best practices for performance optimization and code organization. You'll also discover how to test your Angular applications thoroughly and deploy them to production environments with confidence.

But learning Angular isn't just about mastering the framework itself—it's also about adopting a mindset of continuous improvement and staying up-to-date with the latest tools and techniques. That's why this course goes beyond the basics to cover advanced topics like state management, Angular CLI tips and tricks, and industry best practices.

By the end of the course, you'll have not only the knowledge but also the practical skills to build professional-quality Angular applications from scratch. Whether you're aspiring to become a front-end developer, enhance your career prospects, or simply embark on a new learning journey, \"Learn Angular From Scratch\" is your gateway to success in the world of web development.

Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a proficient Angular developer!

Thanks", "status": "active", "created_at": 1625299225, "updated_at": 1713340885, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 9, "webinar_id": 2003, "locale": "en", "title": "How to Become a Great Listener", "seo_description": "How to Become a Great Listener", "description": "

Effective listening is more than just hearing words; it's about truly understanding the message being conveyed. In this course, you will embark on a journey to master the art of listening and transform the way you engage with others.

Becoming a great listener is not only beneficial in personal relationships but also essential for success in professional settings. Whether you're a leader looking to inspire your team, a colleague striving to collaborate more effectively, or an individual seeking deeper connections with friends and family, this course will equip you with the skills and mindset needed to excel.

Through a combination of interactive lessons, practical exercises, and real-life scenarios, you will learn the fundamentals of active listening and how to overcome common barriers that hinder effective communication. You'll discover the power of empathy and nonverbal communication in building trust and strengthening relationships. Moreover, you'll develop mindfulness techniques to stay present and engaged during conversations, even in challenging situations.

By the end of this course, you'll not only have a deeper understanding of the importance of listening but also the confidence and proficiency to apply these newfound skills in your everyday interactions. Join us on this transformative journey and unlock the secrets to becoming a great listener.

Key Learning Objectives:

  • Understand the importance of listening in personal and professional relationships.
  • Master the fundamentals of active listening, including paraphrasing and summarizing.
  • Overcome barriers to effective listening, such as distractions and biases.
  • Develop empathy and nonverbal communication skills to enhance understanding.
  • Cultivate mindfulness techniques to stay present and engaged during conversations.
  • Handle difficult conversations and conflicts with composure and empathy.
  • Build trust and rapport through attentive and empathetic listening.
  • Reflect on your listening habits and continuously improve your skills.

Target Audience:

  • Professionals seeking to enhance their communication skills.
  • Leaders and managers looking to improve team dynamics and productivity.
  • Individuals interested in deepening their personal relationships.
  • Anyone who wants to become a more effective and empathetic listener in their daily interactions.

Join us on this journey to unlock the full potential of listening and revolutionize the way you connect with others. Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a great listener!

" } ] }, { "id": 2004, "teacher_id": 929, "creator_id": 929, "category_id": 620, "type": "course", "private": 0, "slug": "The-Complete-Digital-Marketing-Guide", "start_date": null, "duration": 70, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/dmar.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/dmark.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nkNHn0VqVBA&list=PL9ooVrP1hQOH-nMMFeSG-DFwyATtUg4YA", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 45, "price": 60, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 0, "downloadable": 1, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 1, "forum": 0, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": null, "points": 600, "message_for_reviewer": null, "status": "active", "created_at": 1625685324, "updated_at": 1713293171, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 10, "webinar_id": 2004, "locale": "en", "title": "The Complete Digital Marketing Guide", "seo_description": "The Bigger Picture: The Probable Future of Energy", "description": "

A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a specialized role within the software development landscape, blending the skills of a software engineer with those of a quality assurance professional. SDETs play a critical role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and scalability of software applications by designing, developing, and maintaining automated test suites and frameworks.

SDETs are responsible for not only identifying and executing test cases but also for actively participating in the software development lifecycle from the early stages of design and development. By leveraging their programming skills and deep understanding of testing methodologies, SDETs collaborate closely with software developers to embed quality assurance practices into the development process itself, rather than treating it as a separate phase.

Key responsibilities of an SDET include:

  1. Automated Testing: Developing and maintaining automated test scripts and frameworks to validate software functionality across different layers of the application stack, including front-end, back-end, and API layers. This involves writing code to simulate user interactions, verify data integrity, and ensure application stability.

  2. Test Planning and Strategy: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop comprehensive test plans, strategies, and acceptance criteria based on project requirements and user stories. SDETs contribute to defining test coverage, prioritizing test cases, and estimating testing efforts for different features and releases.

  3. Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid and reliable software delivery. SDETs work alongside DevOps engineers to automate the build, test, and deployment processes, facilitating faster feedback loops and shorter release cycles.

  4. Performance and Scalability Testing: Conducting performance testing activities to assess the responsiveness, throughput, and scalability of software applications under various load conditions. SDETs leverage performance testing tools and techniques to identify bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and ensure optimal user experience.

  5. Defect Management: Collaborating with development teams to identify, prioritize, and triage software defects throughout the development lifecycle. SDETs utilize defect tracking systems to log and track issues, conduct root cause analysis, and verify defect resolutions to maintain product quality.

  6. Agile and DevOps Practices: Embracing Agile methodologies and DevOps practices to foster collaboration, transparency, and continuous improvement across development and testing teams. SDETs actively participate in Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to align testing activities with development goals.

In essence, SDETs serve as the guardians of software quality, advocating for a culture of quality assurance and automation within organizations. By combining their technical expertise with a passion for delivering high-quality software, SDETs play a pivotal role in driving innovation, mitigating risks, and enhancing customer satisfaction in today's fast-paced software development environment.

" } ] }, { "id": 2022, "teacher_id": 934, "creator_id": 934, "category_id": 613, "type": "course", "private": 0, "slug": "Cyber-Security", "start_date": null, "duration": 90, "timezone": "America/New_York", "thumbnail": "/store/1/cyber-security-.jpg", "image_cover": "/store/1/cyber-security.jpg", "video_demo": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shQEXpUwaIY", "video_demo_source": "youtube", "capacity": 25, "price": 55, "organization_price": null, "support": 1, "certificate": 1, "downloadable": 1, "partner_instructor": 0, "subscribe": 0, "forum": 1, "enable_waitlist": 0, "access_days": 365, "points": 3, "message_for_reviewer": "Thank you for reviewing.", "status": "active", "created_at": 1678910860, "updated_at": 1713270803, "deleted_at": null, "title": null, "description": null, "seo_description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 170, "webinar_id": 2022, "locale": "en", "title": "Cyber Security", "seo_description": "Installment payment is a popular method of paying for goods and services that allows customers to spread out the cost of a purchase over a period of time.", "description": "

Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting computer systems, networks, programs, and data from digital attacks, unauthorized access, theft, or damage aimed at exploitation. With the increasing reliance on digital technologies across all sectors, cybersecurity has become a critical aspect of safeguarding sensitive information, privacy, and maintaining operational integrity.

The scope of cybersecurity encompasses various domains, including:

  1. Network Security: This involves securing the communication channels and data transmission within computer networks. It includes implementing firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and virtual private networks (VPNs) to prevent unauthorized access and ensure data confidentiality and integrity.

  2. Endpoint Security: Endpoint devices such as computers, smartphones, and tablets are often targeted by cybercriminals. Endpoint security focuses on protecting these devices from malware, ransomware, and other malicious threats through antivirus software, encryption, and regular patch management.

  3. Application Security: Applications and software systems may contain vulnerabilities that can be exploited by attackers to gain unauthorized access or disrupt services. Application security involves implementing secure coding practices, performing regular code reviews, and using tools like penetration testing to identify and mitigate potential weaknesses.

  4. Data Security: Data is a valuable asset for organizations, and protecting it from theft, manipulation, or destruction is crucial. Data security involves encrypting sensitive information, implementing access controls, and establishing data backup and recovery procedures to ensure data availability and integrity.

  5. Cloud Security: With the adoption of cloud computing services, organizations need to secure their data and applications hosted on third-party cloud platforms. Cloud security includes implementing strong authentication mechanisms, data encryption, and monitoring tools to detect and respond to suspicious activities in cloud environments.

  6. Identity and Access Management (IAM): IAM involves managing user identities and controlling their access to resources within an organization's IT infrastructure. This includes implementing multi-factor authentication, role-based access controls, and privileged access management to prevent unauthorized users from gaining entry to sensitive systems and data.

  7. Incident Response and Disaster Recovery: Despite preventive measures, cyberattacks may still occur. Incident response plans outline procedures for detecting, analyzing, and mitigating security incidents, while disaster recovery plans ensure the restoration of IT services and data in the event of a cyber breach or natural disaster.

  8. Security Awareness Training: Human error is often a significant contributing factor to cybersecurity incidents. Security awareness training educates employees about potential threats, phishing attacks, and best practices for maintaining security hygiene, reducing the risk of inadvertent security breaches.

In today's interconnected digital landscape, cybersecurity is not only a technical challenge but also a business imperative. Organizations must continually adapt their cybersecurity strategies to address evolving threats and comply with regulatory requirements to safeguard their assets, reputation, and customer trust. Collaboration between cybersecurity professionals, IT teams, management, and stakeholders is essential to effectively manage cyber risks and ensure a resilient security posture.

Additionally, gaining practical experience by officiating matches at lower levels, such as local club or school games, can be invaluable for honing your skills and confidence on the court. Networking with experienced referees and seeking mentorship opportunities can also provide valuable guidance and support as you progress in your officiating journey. Finally, continue to refine your knowledge and skills through ongoing education and participation in workshops, seminars, and certification programs to stay updated on rule changes and best practices in volleyball officiating. Gain experience with real-world projects and specialize in the field of software testing.", "description": "

Software testing is a critical stage in the software development process, ensuring the release of error-free products into the market. The 'Art of Bug Finding: Software Testing Training' course provides participants with a solid foundation in software testing concepts, methodologies, and tools, making it ideal for anyone looking to understand software testing principles.

The course covers fundamental testing principles, test planning, test design, automation testing, and bug tracking. Participants will gain practical experience by working on real-world projects and practicing various test scenarios to enhance their skills.

The training is supported by expert instructors who provide interactive lessons, practical examples, and group exercises. Students are guided at every step, fostering their ability to identify and resolve their own mistakes. Additionally, the course content includes the latest industry trends and best practices.

Upon completion of the course, participants will feel more confident in managing software testing processes, detecting and reporting bugs. They will have also honed a crucial skill for gaining a competitive edge in the business world.

In conclusion, the 'Art of Bug Finding: Software Testing Training' course offers an excellent opportunity for those aspiring to build a career in software testing or professionals looking to enhance their existing skills. Through this course, participants can establish a strong foundation and step confidently into a successful future in the world of software testing.

{ "id": 780, "webinar_id": 2657, "locale": "en", "title": "Yazılım Öğreniyorum", "seo_description": null, "description": "

Yazılım Dünyasına Güçlü Bir Adım Atmak İsteyenler İçin Yepyeni Bir Fırsat!

Teknoloji hızla gelişiyor ve bu gelişime ayak uydurabilmek, hatta öncüsü olabilmek artık bir ayrıcalıktan çok bir gereklilik haline geldi. Yeni açılan yazılım kursumuz, bu değişimin bir parçası olmak isteyen herkese kapılarını açıyor! İster üniversite öğrencisi olun, ister kariyerine yeni bir yön vermek isteyen bir profesyonel, ister sıfırdan başlayıp yazılım alanında uzmanlaşmak isteyen bir girişimci; bu kurs tam size göre!

\r\n\r\n

Kursumuzda, yazılım dünyasına dair hem teorik hem de pratik bilgileri bir arada sunuyoruz. Temel algoritma ve programlama mantığından başlayarak, Python, JavaScript, HTML-CSS, React ve SQL gibi güncel teknolojilere kadar geniş bir yelpazede eğitim veriyoruz. Proje tabanlı eğitim modelimiz sayesinde, katılımcılar öğrendiklerini gerçek dünya projeleri üzerinde uygulama fırsatı buluyor. Bu sayede yalnızca kod yazmayı değil, aynı zamanda problem çözmeyi, ekip çalışmasını ve yazılım geliştirme süreçlerini de öğrenmiş oluyorsunuz.

                    }
                ]

                        "id": 44,
                        "faq_id": 56,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "What is cybersecurity and why is it important?",
                        "answer": "Cybersecurity refers to the practice of protecting computer systems, networks, and data from digital attacks. This includes safeguarding against unauthorized access, exploitation, or damage to information. It's crucial because our digital world relies heavily on technology for communication, commerce, and critical infrastructure. Without adequate cybersecurity measures, individuals, businesses, and governments are vulnerable to various cyber threats, including data breaches, ransomware attacks, and identity theft."
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "id": 57,

                "answer": null,
                "translations": [
                    {
                        "id": 45,
                        "faq_id": 57,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "What are common types of cyber threats?",
                        "answer": "Cyber threats come in various forms, including malware (such as viruses, worms, and Trojans), phishing scams, ransomware attacks, distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks, and insider threats. Each poses unique risks to computer systems, networks, and data. Malware can infect devices and steal sensitive information, while phishing scams trick users into divulging personal information. Ransomware encrypts files and demands payment for their release, and DDoS attacks overwhelm servers with traffic, causing service disruptions. Insider threats involve malicious or negligent actions by employees or other trusted individuals within an organization."
                    }
                ]
            },

                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "How can I protect myself or my organization from cyber attacks?",
                        "answer": "Implementing strong cybersecurity measures is essential for mitigating cyber threats. This includes using up-to-date antivirus software and firewalls, regularly updating software and operating systems to patch vulnerabilities, using strong, unique passwords for all accounts, enabling two-factor authentication, being cautious of suspicious emails or links, educating employees about cybersecurity best practices, and regularly backing up important data. Additionally, organizations should develop and enforce comprehensive cybersecurity policies and procedures and conduct regular security audits and assessments."
                    }
                ]

                        "faq_id": 67,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "What is the role of encryption in cybersecurity?",
                        "answer": "Encryption is a fundamental aspect of cybersecurity that involves encoding information to make it unreadable to unauthorized users. It ensures the confidentiality and integrity of data, even if it's intercepted by malicious actors. Encryption technology is used to secure communications, protect sensitive information stored on devices or transmitted over networks, and safeguard data at rest. It's utilized in various cybersecurity protocols, such as HTTPS for secure web browsing, virtual private networks (VPNs) for secure remote access, and encrypted messaging apps for secure communication."
                    }
                ]

                        "faq_id": 68,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "How does cybersecurity impact privacy rights?",
                        "answer": "Cybersecurity and privacy rights are closely interconnected. While cybersecurity measures are necessary for protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access and cyber attacks, they can also potentially infringe upon individuals' privacy rights if implemented without proper safeguards. For example, extensive data collection and surveillance practices by governments or corporations in the name of cybersecurity may raise concerns about mass surveillance and violations of privacy rights. Balancing cybersecurity needs with respect for privacy rights requires transparent policies, accountability mechanisms, and adherence to legal and ethical principles."
                    }
                ]

                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "What can I expect to learn from this masterclass?",
                        "answer": "Throughout the masterclass, you'll gain a comprehensive understanding of various aspects of health and fitness, including nutrition fundamentals, exercise science, functional movement, mental health, sports nutrition, and holistic wellness practices. You'll learn how to create personalized workout routines, optimize your diet for performance and longevity, manage stress and enhance mental resilience, and cultivate sustainable lifestyle habits for long-term success. Additionally, you'll have the opportunity to engage with expert instructors, participate in interactive sessions, and connect with a supportive community of fellow learners."
                    }
                ]

                        "title": "Is AngularJS still relevant in 2024?",
                        "answer": "While AngularJS has been largely superseded by newer versions of Angular and other modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.js, it still maintains a significant presence in legacy codebases. Many existing applications built with AngularJS continue to be maintained and updated, and there are still organizations using AngularJS in production environments.                         "id": 71,
                        "faq_id": 83,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "How can I improve my listening comprehension skills?",
                        "answer": "Answer: Improving listening comprehension requires consistent practice and targeted strategies. Start by actively listening to a variety of English audio sources such as podcasts, audiobooks, and news broadcasts. Focus on understanding the main ideas, key details, and context of what you're listening to. Practice listening for gist by summarizing the main points after each session. Additionally, work on identifying specific information by listening for keywords and context clues. Engage in activities like shadowing, where you repeat what you hear to improve pronunciation and intonation. Finally, seek out materials with transcripts or subtitles to help reinforce comprehension and provide feedback on your understanding."
                    }
                ]
            },

                        "id": 72,
                        "faq_id": 84,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "How can I become a more fluent and confident English speaker?",
                        "answer": "Answer: Becoming a fluent and confident English speaker requires a combination of practice, exposure, and self-confidence building. Start by engaging in regular conversations with native speakers or language partners to immerse yourself in authentic language use. Practice speaking in various contexts, such as casual conversations, formal presentations, and group discussions. Don't be afraid to make mistakes; instead, view them as opportunities for learning and improvement. Focus on fluency by speaking at a comfortable pace and using filler words or phrases when needed. Work on expanding your vocabulary and mastering common expressions to enhance your ability to express yourself effectively. Finally, cultivate self-confidence by setting achievable goals, celebrating your progress, and embracing challenges as opportunities for growth."
                    }
                ]
            },

                        "id": 451,
                        "faq_id": 465,
                        "locale": "en",
                        "title": "FAQs",
                        "answer": "?Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)\r\n1. Who is this course suitable for?\r\nThis course is ideal for students, recent graduates, and professionals aiming for careers in dairy production, food engineering, or quality control.\r\n2. Are there any prerequisites?\r\nA basic understanding of food science or chemistry and familiarity with concepts like HACCP is recommended. However, all modules are designed to guide learners from foundational knowledge onward.\r\n3. Is the course online or in-person?\r\nThe course is delivered fully online. You can access the modules anytime and progress at your own pace.\r\n4. Does the course include practical content?\r\nYes! You'll find virtual lab simulations, video demonstrations, and real-world case studies designed to reinforce hands-on learning.\r\n5. Will I receive a certificate?\r\nUpon successful completion, participants will receive a recognized digital certificate to showcase their achievement.\r\n6. Is the course content in English or Turkish?\r\nThe course can be offered in both English and Turkish. Depending on the version, all technical terminology is explained in both languages.\r\n7. What career opportunities does this course prepare me for?\r\nGraduates can pursue roles such as Food Technologist, Quality Control Specialist, Dairy Production Supervisor, or R&D Technician.\r\n8. How long does the course take to complete?\r\nThe course includes 6 modules and is designed to be completed in 6–8 weeks. However, you’re free to go faster or slower depending on your schedule.\r\n9. What is the language of instruction?\r\nThe course is conducted entirely in English. All materials, videos, and assessments are designed for an international audience.\r\n10. How long will I have access to the course?\r\nYou’ll have 365 days of full access starting from the day of enrollment. After that period, you can choose to renew your access by repurchasing the course if you'd like to revisit the materials."
                    }
                ]
            },

{ "remark": "success", "status": 200, "data": { "pageTitle": "Products", "products": [ { "id": 1, "creator_id": 1015, "type": "physical", "slug": "Painting-tools", "category_id": 1, "price": 25, "point": 5, "unlimited_inventory": 0, "ordering": 1, "inventory": 28, "inventory_warning": 5, "inventory_updated_at": null, "delivery_fee": 5, "delivery_estimated_time": 4, "message_for_reviewer": "Thank you.", "tax": null, "commission": null, "status": "active", "updated_at": 1656136002, "created_at": 1655622663, "title": null, "seo_description": null, "summary": null, "description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 1, "product_id": 1, "locale": "en", "title": "Painting tools", "seo_description": "Here are some of Manfredini's favorite must-have paint products for a flawless finish and a handful of appealing painter accessories that you can skip altogether", "summary": "When it comes to painting supplies, if it sounds too good to be true, then it usually is. There's really no substitute for quality painting tools, adequate preparation, and careful work. \"One of the easiest things to remember about paint tools is that you get what you pay for,\" says Lou Manfredini, home expert for Ace Hardware. \"The biggest mistake I see homeowners make is that they buy cheap tools that don't give them good results, or they buy cheap paint—then they end up with a poor finished product.\"", "description": "

Here are some of Manfredini's favorite must-have paint products for a flawless finish and a handful of appealing painter accessories that you can skip altogether. Keep in mind that you may not need some of these products if your walls are in good shape and don't need a lot of repairs. (Just make sure you purchase some highly-rated paint first because a quality tool won't work miracles on low-quality paint).


Paint Key

You don't need a special tool to open your paint cans; a standard flat-head screwdriver works just fine.

Plastic Tube for Paint Roller

If you're done painting for the day but want to pick it back up tomorrow, cover the roller in plastic wrap, then throw it into a plastic bag with an air-tight seal.

Paint Tray Liners

These aren't necessary if you get a quality hard plastic paint tray. Plus, it's less wasteful if you don't throw away a plastic liner each time you paint.

Paint Pads

Skip these, unless you're using them to paint behind hard-to-reach areas like a toilet tank or radiator.

Fillable Paint Products

\"Any gadget that sucks paint up into its handle is a nightmare to use and to clean. In the time it takes to refill it, you could already be painting,\" says Manfredini. The exception here is the touch-up tool that Manfredini recommended specifically.

" } ] }, { "id": 2, "creator_id": 934, "type": "physical", "slug": "Advanced-microscope", "category_id": 2, "price": 290, "point": 4, "unlimited_inventory": 0, "ordering": 1, "inventory": 11, "inventory_warning": 3, "inventory_updated_at": null, "delivery_fee": 10, "delivery_estimated_time": 7, "message_for_reviewer": "Please review ASAP.\r\nRegards.", "tax": null, "commission": null, "status": "active", "updated_at": 1656135835, "created_at": 1655626642, "title": null, "seo_description": null, "summary": null, "description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 2, "product_id": 2, "locale": "en", "title": "Advanced microscope", "seo_description": "A microscope is a laboratory instrument used to examine objects that are too small to be seen by the naked eye.", "summary": "There are many types of microscopes, and they may be grouped in different ways. One way is to describe the method an instrument uses to interact with a sample and produce images, either by sending a beam of light or electrons through a sample in its optical path, by detecting photon emissions from a sample, or by scanning across and a short distance from the surface of a sample using a probe.", "description": "

This OMAX binocular biological compound microscope offers six magnifications between 40X and 2500X.  The lab microscope comes with a 45 inclined 360 swiveling binocular sliding viewing head, two pairs of widefield eyepieces with an adjustable diopter on oculars, four achromatic objectives, stain-resistant double layer mechanical stage with scales, coarse and fine focusing on both sides, NA 1.25 Abbe condenser with iris diaphragm and variable intensity LED transmitted illumination system.  This type of microscope is perfect for home school, teaching, demonstration, clinical examination, laboratories, and advanced applications. It is easy to mount an electronic eyepiece (digital microscope camera) for capturing images and live video on a computer.  It can also be added a darkfield condenser to switch a brightfield microscope to a darkfield microscope.


" } ] }, { "id": 4, "creator_id": 1016, "type": "virtual", "slug": "Sherlock-Holmes-e-book", "category_id": 3, "price": 5, "point": 2, "unlimited_inventory": 1, "ordering": 1, "inventory": null, "inventory_warning": null, "inventory_updated_at": 1655670958, "delivery_fee": null, "delivery_estimated_time": null, "message_for_reviewer": "Thank you for your review.", "tax": null, "commission": null, "status": "active", "updated_at": 1655670958, "created_at": 1655669205, "title": null, "seo_description": null, "summary": null, "description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 4, "product_id": 4, "locale": "en", "title": "Sherlock Holmes e-book", "seo_description": "Sherlock Holmes is a fictional detective created by British author Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.", "summary": "Sherlock Holmes is a fictional detective created by British author Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Referring to himself as a \"consulting detective\" in the stories, Holmes is known for his proficiency with observation, deduction, forensic science and logical reasoning that borders on the fantastic, which he employs when investigating cases for a wide variety of clients, including Scotland Yard.", "description": "

Though not the first fictional detective, Sherlock Holmes is arguably the best known.[1] By the 1990s there were already over 25,000 stage adaptations, films, television productions and publications featuring the detective,[2] and Guinness World Records lists him as the most portrayed literary human character in film and television history.[3] Holmes's popularity and fame are such that many have believed him to be not a fictional character but a real individual;[4][5][6] numerous literary and fan societies have been founded on this pretence. Avid readers of the Holmes stories helped create the modern practice of fandom.[7] The character and stories have had a profound and lasting effect on mystery writing and popular culture as a whole, with the original tales as well as thousands written by authors other than Conan Doyle being adapted into stage and radio plays, television, films, video games, and other media for over one hundred years.

Remember, you will be the best linguist, so are you ready to start?" } ] }, { "id": 6, "creator_id": 1, "type": "virtual", "slug": "Where-the-Crawdads-Sing-e-book", "category_id": 3, "price": 20, "point": 1, "unlimited_inventory": 1, "ordering": 1, "inventory": 0, "inventory_warning": null, "inventory_updated_at": null, "delivery_fee": null, "delivery_estimated_time": null, "message_for_reviewer": null, "tax": null, "commission": null, "status": "active", "updated_at": 1656322425, "created_at": 1656321480, "title": null, "seo_description": null, "summary": null, "description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 6, "product_id": 6, "locale": "en", "title": "Where the Crawdads Sing e-book", "seo_description": "The #1 New York Times bestselling worldwide sensation with more than 12 million copies sold", "summary": "SOON TO BE A MAJOR MOTION PICTURE—The #1 New York Times bestselling worldwide sensation with more than 12 million copies sold, hailed by The New York Times Book Review as “a painfully beautiful first novel that is at once a murder mystery, a coming-of-age narrative and a celebration of nature.”\r\n\r\nFor years, rumors of the “Marsh Girl” have haunted Barkley Cove, a quiet town on the North Carolina coast. So in late 1969, when handsome Chase Andrews is found dead, the locals immediately suspect Kya Clark, the so-called Marsh Girl. But Kya is not what they say. Sensitive and intelligent, she has survived for years alone in the marsh that she calls home, finding friends in the gulls and lessons in the sand. Then the time comes when she yearns to be touched and loved. When two young men from town become intrigued by her wild beauty, Kya opens herself to a new life—until the unthinkable happens.\r\n\r\nWhere the Crawdads Sing is at once an exquisite ode to the natural world, a heartbreaking coming-of-age story, and a surprising tale of possible murder. Owens reminds us that we are forever shaped by the children we once were and that we are all subject to the beautiful and violent secrets that nature keeps.", "description": "
“A painfully beautiful first novel that is at once a murder mystery, a coming-of-age narrative and a celebration of nature....Owens here surveys the desolate marshlands of the North Carolina coast through the eyes of an abandoned child. And in her isolation that child makes us open our own eyes to the secret wonders—and dangers—of her private world.”—The New York Times Book Review

“Steeped in the rhythms and shadows of the coastal marshes of North Carolina’s Outer Banks, this fierce and hauntingly beautiful novel centers on...Kya’s heartbreaking story of learning to trust human connections, intertwine[d] with a gripping murder mystery, revealing savage truths. An astonishing debut.”—People

“This lush mystery is perfect for fans of Barbara Kingsolver.”—Bustle

“A lush debut novel, Owens delivers her mystery wrapped in gorgeous, lyrical prose. It’s clear she’s from this place—the land of the southern coasts, but also the emotional terrain—you can feel it in the pages.  A magnificent achievement, ambitious, credible and very timely.”—Alexandra Fuller, New York Times bestselling author of Don’t Let’s Go to the Dogs Tonight

“Heart-wrenching...A fresh exploration of isolation and nature from a female perspective along with a compelling love story.”—Entertainment Weekly

“This wonderful novel has a bit of everything—mystery, romance, and fascinating characters, all told in a story that takes place in North Carolina.”—Nicholas Sparks, New York Times bestselling author of Every Breath

“Delia Owen’s gorgeous novel is both a coming-of-age tale and an engrossing whodunit.”—Real Simple

“Evocative...Kya makes for an unforgettable heroine.”—Publishers Weekly

“The New Southern novel...A lyrical debut.”—Southern Living

“A nature-infused romance with a killer twist.”—Refinery29

“Anyone who liked The Great Alone will want to read Where the Crawdads Sing....This astonishing debut is a beautiful and haunting novel that packs a powerful punch. It’s the first novel in a long time that made me cry.”—Kristin Hannah, author ofThe Great AloneandThe Nightingale

“Both a coming-of-age story and a mysterious account of a murder investigation told from the perspective of a young girl...Through Kya’s story, Owens explores how isolation affects human behavior, and the deep effect that rejection can have on our lives.”—Vanity Fair

“Lyrical...Its appeal ris[es] from Kya’s deep connection to the place where makes her home, and to all of its creatures.”—Booklist

“This beautiful, evocative novel is likely to stay with you for many days afterward....absorbing.”—AARP 

“This haunting tale captivates every bit as much for its crime drama elements as for the humanity at its core.” —Mystery & Suspense Magazine

“Compelling, original...A mystery, a courtroom drama, a romance and a coming-of-age story, Where the Crawdads Sing is a moving, beautiful tale. Readers will remember Kya for a long, long time.”—ShelfAwareness

“With prose luminous as a low-country moon, Owens weaves a compelling tale of a forgotten girl in the unforgiving coastal marshes of North Carolina. It is a murder mystery/love story/courtroom drama that readers will love, but the novel delves so much deeper into the bone and sinew of our very nature, asking often unanswerable questions, old and intractable as the marsh itself. A stunning debut!”—Christopher Scotton, author of The Secret Wisdom of the Earth

“A compelling mystery with prose so luminous it can cut through the murkiest of pluff mud.”—Augusta Chronicle

“Carries the rhythm of an old time ballad. It is clear Owens knows this land intimately, from the black mud sucking at footsteps to the taste of saltwater and the cry of seagulls.”—David Joy, author of The Line That Held Us

{ "remark": "success", "status": 200, "data": { "id": 1, "creator_id": 1015, "type": "physical", "slug": "Painting-tools", "category_id": 1, "price": 25, "point": 5, "unlimited_inventory": 0, "ordering": 1, "inventory": 28, "inventory_warning": 5, "inventory_updated_at": null, "delivery_fee": 5, "delivery_estimated_time": 4, "message_for_reviewer": "Thank you.", "tax": null, "commission": null, "status": "active", "updated_at": 1656136002, "created_at": 1655622663, "title": null, "seo_description": null, "summary": null, "description": null, "translations": [ { "id": 1, "product_id": 1, "locale": "en", "title": "Painting tools", "seo_description": "Here are some of Manfredini's favorite must-have paint products for a flawless finish and a handful of appealing painter accessories that you can skip altogether", "summary": "When it comes to painting supplies, if it sounds too good to be true, then it usually is. There's really no substitute for quality painting tools, adequate preparation, and careful work. \"One of the easiest things to remember about paint tools is that you get what you pay for,\" says Lou Manfredini, home expert for Ace Hardware. \"The biggest mistake I see homeowners make is that they buy cheap tools that don't give them good results, or they buy cheap paint—then they end up with a poor finished product.\"", "description": "

Here are some of Manfredini's favorite must-have paint products for a flawless finish and a handful of appealing painter accessories that you can skip altogether. Keep in mind that you may not need some of these products if your walls are in good shape and don't need a lot of repairs. (Just make sure you purchase some highly-rated paint first because a quality tool won't work miracles on low-quality paint).


Paint Key

You don't need a special tool to open your paint cans; a standard flat-head screwdriver works just fine.

Plastic Tube for Paint Roller

If you're done painting for the day but want to pick it back up tomorrow, cover the roller in plastic wrap, then throw it into a plastic bag with an air-tight seal.

Paint Tray Liners

These aren't necessary if you get a quality hard plastic paint tray. Plus, it's less wasteful if you don't throw away a plastic liner each time you paint.

Paint Pads

Skip these, unless you're using them to paint behind hard-to-reach areas like a toilet tank or radiator.

Fillable Paint Products

\"Any gadget that sucks paint up into its handle is a nightmare to use and to clean. In the time it takes to refill it, you could already be painting,\" says Manfredini. The exception here is the touch-up tool that Manfredini recommended specifically.

" } ] } }

{
  "type": "virtual",
  "price": 100,
  "category_id":2,
  "title": "Introduction to Yoga: A Beginner's Guide Video Course",
  "summary": "Discover the transformative power of yoga and embark on a journey to wellness.",
  "description": "Are you ready to embark on a journey to holistic wellness? 'Introduction to Yoga: A Beginner's Guide' is designed for individuals who want to explore the ancient practice of yoga and reap its numerous benefits. In this comprehensive course, you will learn the fundamentals of yoga, including basic poses, breathing techniques, and meditation practices. Led by experienced yoga instructors, you will develop strength, flexibility, and inner peace as you progress through the course. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to deepen your practice, this course will empower you to cultivate a healthier mind, body, and spirit. Join us and unlock the transformative power of yoga today!"
}

request.description: It is a get query that lists the details of the product faq for a specific id in the database for the logged in admin. You can run the /api/productfaqs query for product faq id.

response.name: success
failed (no product faq)

request.description: It is a post query to add content to the product faq table in the database.

response.name: failed (no request)

request.description: It is a patch query prepared to update the product faq with the id number specified in the product faqs in the database You can run the api/productfaqs query for product faq id.

response.name: failed (no product faq)

request.description: It is a del query to delete the content with the id number specified in the product faqs table in the database. The ID number can be retrieved from the api/productfaq query.

response.name: failed (no product faq)
